org.jplot2d.element

Interface Axis

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, PComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AxisEx, ColorbarAxis, ColorbarAxisEx, PlotAxis, PlotAxisEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AxisImpl, ColorbarAxisImpl, PlotAxisImpl

    public interface Axis
extends PComponent
    A component to represent an axis. It has visual properties such as line width, tick height, etc. An axis also has a title element, which group all title related properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        @Nonnull
AxisTitle getTitle()
        Returns the title of this axis.
        Returns:
        the title of this axis

      • getTickManager

        @Nullable
AxisTickManager getTickManager()
        Returns the tick manager of this axis.

        In a plot, a plot axis must has a tick manager, which includes this axis at least. After removing an axis with shared tick manager, the tick manager of the removed axis is null. Such an axis cannot be added to a plot, unless set a tick manager first.

        Returns:
        the tick manager of this axis

      • setTickManager

        void setTickManager(@Nonnull
                  AxisTickManager tickManager)

        void setAxisLineWidth(float width)

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • getTickLineWidth

        float getTickLineWidth()
        Returns the tick line width in pt(1/72 inch)
        Returns:
        the tick line width

      • setTickLineWidth

        void setTickLineWidth(float width)
        Sets the line width for ticks and minor ticks. The width is in pt(1/72 inch). The default line width is 0.5 pt. Setting tick line width also effect the grid line width and minor grid line width. The grid line width is 1/2 of tick line width, and the minor grid line width is 1/4 of tick line width.
        Parameters:
        width - the tick line width

      • isLabelVisible

        boolean isLabelVisible()
        Returns if the labels is shown or not
        Returns:
        trueif the tick mark is shown

        Parameters:

AxisLabelSide getLabelSide()

      • setLabelSide

        void setLabelSide(@Nonnull
                AxisLabelSide side)
        Set the side of the labels. The default value is AxisLabelSide.OUTWARD.

                       AxisOrientation orientation)
        Set the orientation of the labels. The default value is AxisOrientation.HORIZONTAL.
        Parameters:
